reviews.review_msg: Best Prof ever. Well-organized, enthusiastic, and knows the materials very well. He posted all the dates for assignments, labs, quizzes, and exams from the first day of semester. He was flexible though to make some changes to the favor of class. Wonderful teaching style that I liked very much as he provides a summary of what he taught last session.

Alot of material in this course, classes are really boring, his voice puts u sleep at 830 classes. didnt show any interest in material himself, hard exams and quizes. Didnt learn much from this class.
His exams were  fair, and he is caring students by providing feedback. I loved his course.
The hardest part of the course is understanding his english. Useless going to his lectures. He is really boring and needs to work on his english ASAP!

Really fantastic prof. Cares for students interest, learning and grades. Lectures are very informative and well written. There is lots of animations that aid in understanding the material. Well worth the time. I would have liked to see a more challenging final competition, or small a final project if future budget allows.
really good class and it can be attributed to the prof.  very knowledgeable and informative- lectures were really great.  final was hard however grades were scaled

Good prof, but ruined my opinion of him after the final.  The lectures were very informative and he was very knowledgeable, but the final was ridiculous.  Open book, way too long, and the questions that weren't directly in the note were almost impossible.  I don't pay $3000 a semester to just copy out the notes on the final.
resourceful like MacGyver, you might as well call him MacGyver. he likes to take his time at lunch, don't try to bother him then.
a very kind and understanding prof. Always listens to what his students has to say and will try to adjust accordingly.
